speaker: THERSITES
text: The cuckold and the cuckold-maker are at

speaker: THERSITES
text: it. Now, bull! Now, dog! Loo, Paris, loo! Now, my

speaker: THERSITES
text: double-horned Spartan! Loo, Paris, loo! The bull

speaker: THERSITES
text: has the game. Ware horns, ho!

speaker: THERSITES
text: I am a bastard too. I love bastards. I am

speaker: THERSITES
text: bastard begot, bastard instructed, bastard in mind,

speaker: THERSITES
text: bastard in valor, in everything illegitimate. One

speaker: THERSITES
text: bear will not bite another, and wherefore should

speaker: THERSITES
text: one bastard? Take heed: the quarrel’s most ominous

speaker: THERSITES
text: to us. If the son of a whore fight for a whore,
